summary: By the time I reached the age of thirteen, I had horror fever.  I was renting every film I could get my hands on and had even begun buying VHS tapes.  I knew the classics (Halloween, Friday the 13th, Nightmare on Elm Street), and was familiar with some popular box art (Dead Alive, Ghost Story, Evil Dead 2) and was beginning to learn about more classic titles thanks to the now defunct siteÂ House of Horrors...
title: My First Viewing of Night of the Living Dead

summary: Researchers at Google have developed a watermark for LLM-generated text.  The basics are pretty obvious: the LLM chooses between tokens partly based on a cryptographic key, and someone with knowledge of the key can detect those choices.  What makes this hard is (1) how much text is required for the watermark to work, and (2) how robust the watermark is to post-generation editing...
title: Watermark for LLM-Generated Text
